actions.text: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 231 - 182 (Roll No. 447).

description: Amendment deletes language that would have repealed section 907 of the FREEDOM Support Act which prohibits direct U.S. government aid to Azerbaijan.
purpose: An amendment numbered 32 printed in the Congressional Record to strike section 579 that repeals section 907 of the FREEDOM Support Act prohibiting direct U.S. government assistance to Azerbaijan.
